document.full_text: medical student ahmed widaa was content to support sudan's ruling party from the sidelines for years, until the uprisings in tunisia and neighboring egypt made him worry that sudan could be next.
document.title: sudan's cyber-defenders take on facebook protesters
lines_and_colors: medical student ahmed widaa was content to support sudan's ruling party from the sidelines for years, until the uprisings in tunisia and neighboring egypt made him worry that sudan could be next.
